solution_line_template: Grant's {total_baby_teeth} baby teeth - {dropped_teeth} tooth he dropped - {swallowed_teeth} he swallowed = <<{total_baby_teeth}-{dropped_teeth}-{swallowed_teeth}={teeth_for_fairy}>>{teeth_for_fairy} teeth left for the tooth fairy.
We aren't counting his first tooth, so {teeth_for_fairy} teeth - {first_tooth_not_counted} first tooth = <<{teeth_for_fairy}-{first_tooth_not_counted}={teeth_after_first}>>{teeth_after_first} teeth.

Grant received ${total_money_received} - ${first_tooth_money} = $<<{total_money_received}-{first_tooth_money}={money_after_first_tooth}>>{money_after_first_tooth} in total for all the teeth after the first.

So he received ${money_after_first_tooth} / {teeth_after_first} teeth = $<<{money_after_first_tooth}/{teeth_after_first}={money_per_tooth_after_first}>>{money_per_tooth_after_first} for each tooth after his first tooth.
